name: The Seven (demo)
description:
The Seven is an interactive fiction game set in a fantasy world. Your character and choices are all your own.

Created to be a new take on narrative fiction,  the Seven attempts to tell the story of the ancient Goddesses Seven and their impact upon Creation and it's continuing existence.

This demo lasts about fifteen minutes and consists of creating a basic character. As this is a work in progress, all gameplay is subject to change.
